item.title: 邦德卫士眼中的 "美丽
item.description:
特朗普希望减税的底线是增加赤字。【原文：

The bottom line of Trump’s desired tax cuts will be greater deficits.

】

item.title: 需求减弱，新加坡房屋销售连续第二个月下滑
item.description: 新加坡私人住宅销售连续第二个月下降，原因是贸易紧张局势加剧了人们对经济前景的不安，导致对新项目的需求减少。【原文：Singapore private home sales fell for a second month as demand for new projects dimmed at a time when trade tensions are fueling unease about the economic outlook.】

item.title: 曼哈顿租金创历史新高，暗示未来将有更多涨幅
item.description: 曼哈顿的公寓市场正进入一年中竞争最激烈的几个月，租金已经创下历史新高。在整个夏季，租金还会继续上涨。【原文：Manhattan’s apartment market is heading into its most competitive months of the year with rents already at record highs. They’re only likely to continue rising through the summer.】

item.title: 乌干达银行购买 15 亿美元，利用外汇掉期增加储备
item.description: 本财政年度，乌干达银行从市场上购买了 15 亿美元，并在外汇储备因援助冻结和债务偿还而消耗殆尽后，利用货币互换来重建外汇储备。【原文：The Bank of Uganda has bought $1.5 billion from the market this fiscal year and used currency swaps to rebuild its foreign-exchange reserves after they were drained by an aid freeze and debt repayments.】

item.title: 谁在花钱调暗太阳？我们应该知道
item.description:
围绕太阳能地球工程研发的公众讨论与日俱增，但太阳能地球工程并非气候变化的解决方案。【原文：

Funding for solar geoengineering is growing as rapidly as the public discourse around its research and development, but it’s not a climate-change solution. 

】

item.title: 中美贸易冲突有可能使欧洲成为廉价商品的倾销地
item.description: 中国对欧盟的贸易顺差不断扩大，加剧了新的担忧，即在华盛顿和中国政府之间动荡的关税对抗中，这个由 27 个国家组成的集团有可能成为廉价商品的倾销地。【原文：China’s widening trade surplus with the European Union is fueling fresh concerns that the 27-nation bloc risks becoming a dumping ground for cheap goods in the volatile tariff confrontation between Washington and Beijing.】

item.title: 美国优先政策促使非洲初创企业寻求新的支持者
item.description: Oko Finance 是摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）支持的一家为非洲农民提供灾害保险的初创公司，该公司原本有望在今年实现盈利，直到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）削减资金，使其最大的客户流失。【原文：Oko Finance, a Morgan Stanley-backed startup providing disaster insurance to farmers in Africa, was on track to become profitable this year — until US President Donald Trump’s funding cuts gutted its biggest customer.】

item.title: 德意志银行向财富客户出售科勒二级 PE 基金
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）与二级市场专家科勒资本公司（Coller Capital）达成协议，向欧洲和亚洲的富裕客户出售其主要基金之一，以满足日益增长的另类投资需求。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG struck a deal with secondaries specialist Coller Capital to sell one of its main funds to wealthy European and Asian clients amid rising demand for alternative investments.】

item.title: 由 StanChart 支持的 Algbra 与 Gatehouse 合作经营英国账户
item.description: 科威特盖特豪斯金融集团有限公司（Gatehouse Financial Group Ltd.）的英国银行部门正在与伦敦金融技术公司 Algbra Group 合作，为希望投资英国房地产市场的海外居民提供新的数字账户。【原文：The UK banking arm of Kuwait’s Gatehouse Financial Group Ltd. is partnering with London-based financial technology firm Algbra Group to provide new digital accounts for overseas residents looking to invest in the UK property market.】

item.title: 台湾平息对国有银行美国国债风险的担忧
item.description: 台湾表示，对其国有支持银行的美国国债头寸及其内部风险管理措施的最新审查迄今未发现重大问题。【原文：Taiwan said the latest review of US Treasuries positions at its state-backed banks and their internal risk-management measures have so far found no major issues.】

item.title: 美国对石油货运检查员的制裁令新加坡贸易商感到震惊
item.description: 华盛顿对一家总部设在新加坡的石油服务公司的制裁在当地贸易界引起了轩然大波，同时再次引起了人们对将伊朗石油运往中国的秘密供应链的关注。【原文：Washington’s sanctioning of a Singapore-based oil-services company has sent ripples through the local trading community, while renewing a focus on the clandestine supply chain that moves Iranian oil to China.】

item.title: 韩国 24 年来首次取消存款保险上限
item.description: 韩国将从 9 月起把每位客户的存款保险限额提高一倍，达到 1 亿韩元（71,174 美元），这是近四分之一世纪以来首次提高存款保险限额，以增强人们对银行系统的信心。【原文：South Korea will double the deposit insurance limit to 100 million won ($71,174) per client from September, raising the cap for the first time in nearly a quarter of a century to boost confidence in the banking system.】

item.title: 马来西亚要求孟加拉国撤销移民劳工调查
item.description: 马来西亚政府已要求孟加拉国审查并撤销对两国间劳工移民不法行为的 "未经证实的指控"，以提高马来西亚在美国年度人口贩运报告中的评级。【原文：The Malaysian government has asked Bangladesh to review and withdraw “unsubstantiated allegations” of wrongdoing in labor migration between the two countries to improve Malaysia’s rating in an annual US report on human trafficking.】

item.title: 中国煤炭过剩导致市场陷入恶性下滑循环
item.description: 据中国顶级行业组织称，由于燃料供应持续过剩，中国煤炭价格仍在螺旋式下跌。【原文：Chinese coal prices remain locked in a downward spiral due to a persistent glut of the fuel, according to the country’s top industry group.】

item.title: 澳大利亚最大的几家银行出了什么问题？
item.description:
本周的澳大利亚播客：监管机构再次对银行交易展开调查，我们最大的几家金融机构究竟出了什么问题？【原文：

On this week’s Australia Podcast: As the regulator launches yet another probe into bank trading, what is going wrong at some of our biggest financial institutions?

】

item.title: Meta 挑选东南亚资深人士担任亚太区负责人
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司将提升其东南亚地区的长期负责人为亚太地区的最高业务主管，亚太地区是该公司的主要增长市场之一。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is elevating its longtime head of Southeast Asia to be its senior-most business executive for the broader Asia-Pacific region, one of its main growth markets.】

item.title: Cotality 称，澳大利亚 100 万澳元以上的住宅创历史新高
item.description: 澳大利亚是世界上最昂贵的房地产市场之一，根据咨询公司 Cotality 的研究，目前澳大利亚三分之一以上的住宅价值在 100 万澳元（约合 643850 美元）或以上。【原文：More than a third of homes in Australia, one of the world’s most expensive property markets, are now valued at A$1 million ($643,850) or more, according to research by consultancy Cotality.】

item.title: 孟加拉国在国际货币基金组织推动下取消货币流动限制
item.description: 孟加拉国废除了一项限制其货币变动的命令，同时加大力度采用由市场决定的汇率。【原文：Bangladesh has repealed an order that limited movements in its currency as it boosts efforts to adopt a market-determined exchange rate.】

item.title: 信实集团获得 29 亿美元 2023 年以来最大一笔印度贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）拥有的信实工业公司（Reliance Industries）获得了一笔相当于 29 亿美元的双币种借款，这是一年多来印度最大的一笔离岸贷款。【原文：Billionaire Mukesh Ambani-owned Reliance Industries has obtained a dual-currency borrowing of $2.9 billion-equivalent, according to people familiar with the matter, the largest offshore Indian loan in over a year.】

item.title: 印度金属股成为中美贸易紧张局势缓和的受益者
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 恒瑞医药寻求在香港上市，融资额高达 13 亿美元
item.description: 江苏恒瑞医药股份有限公司（Jiangsu Hengrui Pharmaceuticals Co., Ltd.）已开始接受投资者的香港上市申请，此次上市可能会筹集多达 99 亿港元（13 亿美元）的资金，这是促进金融中心股票销售复苏的最新一笔重要交易。【原文：Jiangsu Hengrui Pharmaceuticals Co. has started taking investor orders for a Hong Kong listing that could raise as much as HK$9.9 billion ($1.3 billion), the latest significant deal to boost the financial hub’s share-sale recovery.】

item.title: 据说星巴克将启动出售庞大中国业务股份的程序
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，星巴克公司已与私募股权投资公司、科技公司和其他公司进行了接触，以考虑其中国业务的各种选择，包括可能的股权出售。【原文：Starbucks Corp. has contacted private equity firms, technology companies and others as it considers options for its China business, including a possible stake sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度央行寻求重振对货币政策至关重要的融资市场
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，随着当局向贷款人倡导使用该市场，一个主要由印度银行使用的日渐萎缩的借贷市场正显示出生机勃勃的迹象。【原文：A dwindling borrowing market used mainly by Indian banks is showing signs of life as authorities champion its usage to lenders, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 小米电动车在经历致命车祸和虚假广告索赔后销量下滑
item.description: 自 3 月份以来，小米公司的电动汽车在中国的销售受到冲击，原因是发生了一起致命的高速公路事故，以及消费者对其一款汽车的营销不满。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. electric vehicle sales in China have taken a hit since March after a fatal highway accident and consumer unhappiness around the marketing of one version of its car.】

item.title: 房价下跌，香港顶级开发商数小时内售罄房屋
item.description: 香港最大的房地产开发商新鸿基地产有限公司（Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd.）一个新项目的首批住房在数小时内售罄，原因是两年多来最低的抵押贷款利率吸引了购房者。【原文：Hong Kong’s biggest property developer Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd. sold out the first batch of homes for a new project within hours, as the lowest mortgage rates in more than two years lured buyers.】

item.title: 中国投资者发出信号：贸易停战不是市场的灵丹妙药
item.description: 在减少政策刺激的预期和最终协议的不确定性挥之不去的情况下，贸易休战还不足以引发对中国金融资产的抢购。【原文：The trade truce is not enough to ignite a rush into Chinese financial assets amid expectations of reduced policy stimulus and lingering uncertainty on a final deal.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 4 月就业岗位激增，货币在澳大利亚央行会议前上涨
item.description: 澳大利亚 4 月份的就业率飙升，而失业率则保持稳定，因为有更多的人在寻找工作，在储备银行预计进一步降低利率之际，这凸显了劳动力市场的韧性。【原文：Australian employment soared in April while the jobless rate held steady as more people sought work, highlighting the resilience of the labor market at a time when the Reserve Bank is expected to reduce interest rates further.】

item.title: 乐天集团股价下跌，季度亏损超预期
item.description: 日本电子商务公司乐天集团（Rakuten Group Inc.【原文：Rakuten Group Inc. shares tumbled after the Japanese e-commerce firm reported a 19th straight quarterly loss, fueling concerns about the financial drag from its ailing mobile business.】

item.title: 中国风险较高的短期公司债券利差降至创纪录水平
item.description: 中国央行最新的货币宽松政策引发了地方企业债券的新一轮反弹，随着投资者加大杠杆押注，风险溢价创下历史新低。【原文：The Chinese central bank’s latest monetary easing has triggered a fresh rally in local corporate bonds, sending risk premiums to a record low as investors ramped up leveraged bets.】

item.title: 降息可能性增大，菲律宾债券反弹时机成熟
item.description: 未来几个月，菲律宾主权债券可能会反弹，因为经济增长放缓和通胀放缓会增强进一步降息的理由。【原文：Philippine sovereign bonds may rally in the coming months as slowing growth and easing inflation boost the case for further interest-rate cuts.】
